name: The Necronomicon
description:
The Necronomicon - Legend of Cthulhu

Embark a on a journey to defeat the keeper of R'lyeh, Cthulhu, who threatens all of humankind. 

Based on Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos, The game takes you through an exciting yet dangerous adventure through the different realms of the universe.

An Indie Developer's First Game 

Music by www.bensound.com

Assets by www.craftpix.com, www.opengameart.com, www.itch.io
